Articles.Content:
So, I will be placing my ships, rovers, and landers all in this nifty forum post, please note I am bad at KSP (Or just look at the graves of our favorite green man woman lemming things)

NOTE: The quotes are the blurbs from the ship save.

PSS: All downloads are mediafire/mega.nz (Cause they're quicker for me)

PSSS: Pics are Imgur only.

PSSSS: All ships made in sandbox.

 

So:

 

ROVERS: "WHEE Driving around the surfaces of a planet is fun, but sometimes its needed for SCIENCE, find enclosed some of my best (And worst) rovers"

 

LANDERS: "Aaaand touch down, wait... WE DIDN'T BRING DESSERT!" (Find below my landers)
 

The HOPEFUL MK I

Quote

The Hopeful MKI is a cheap, fast, easy to use lander, it only fails 57.8% of the time, hence the name Hopeful

(This WILL need another rocket to get it up, as the small boosters are for landing BUT they can propell the lander in atmoshphere)

Pics of the Hopeful MKI (Imgur)

Download (Mediafire)

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hopeful MK I

Quote

So SOMEONE said the hopeful MkI took to many lives, so a revised version is here, made to go faster and have more fuel, though it looks like a tower... BUT IT HAS DESSERT ON BOARD. (Planned for future release)

 

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ORBITERS: "Yeah we need to circle around this thing" (Please find enclosed my orbiters, mainly made to orbit far planets or Kerbin"

 

STATIONS: "We need to circle around this thing, but BIGGER" (Find enclosed my best stations. This'll mainly be empty)

 

STATION BITS: "All good things come in small packages" (Bits to clip onto stations)
